instructions: In a microwave-safe bowl, mix everything but the tortilla and lettuce. Then microwave the mixture for 1 minute, or until heated through. Nuke the tortilla for 10 seconds, or until warm. Put the lettuce on the tortilla and top with the chicken. Fold up the bottom and roll the sides over the filling.
ingredients: 1/2 (10 ounce) can chunk chicken breast, drained and flaked
title: Pesto-Poultry Wrap
